Items.Title: Build It Plugin Core
Items.Description:
Core module for Build It Plugin


What's new:

Introducing an all-new driving experience and brand-new ways to get on the road.

·  Vehicle Driving Module – a completely new system that lets you get in and drive vehicles
·  AdVehicleSpawner (new) – advertisement object that let's you instantly receive a temporary vehicle as your reward
·  VehicleVendor (new) – interactable booth to browse and select from available vehicles

Themes.Title: Vehicle
Themes.Name: asset.vehicle
Themes.Description:
Vehicle Theme

We’ve added a complete set of 24 vehicles designed to work seamlessly with the new driving system. They’re ready to drop straight into your project so you can start creating right away!

Themes.Description: A brand-new theme has arrived, created in collaboration with our amazing creator community, bringing a fresh and adventurous style to your world!
